content: The Five Whys The Five Whys is a simple but powerful technique for drilling past symptoms to find root causes. Ask "why?" repeatedly until you reach a cause you can actually address. The Method Start with a problem statement Ask "Why did this happen?" content: Pareto Analysis Pareto Analysis applies the 80/20 rule to problem-solving: roughly 80% of effects come from 20% of causes. By identifying and focusing on the vital few, you get maximum impact from limited resources. The Principle Not all causes are equal. A few critical causes typically account for most of the problem.
